## isPromise() function

检查值是否是Promise对象

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function isPromise<T = any>(val: unknown): val is Promise<T>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  val | unknown | 要检查的值 |

**Returns:**

val is Promise&lt;T&gt;

{<!-- -->boolean<!-- -->} 布尔值结果
